title: Steve Bannon Sentenced to 4 Months in Prison for Contempt of Congress
description: Stephen Bannon was found guilty of two counts of contempt of Congress this summer for defying a subpoena from the House Jan. 6 committee.
dc:creator: Glenn Thrush and Alan Feuer
category: House Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack
media:description: Stephen K. Bannon has used his daily internet radio show to skewer the government for prosecuting him.
